- The new *9th edition* of Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Chinese Dictionary is now available, with 1,000+ extra entries that are exclusively available in the app version but not the print dictionary, and over 6,000 new words, new meanings and revisions
- Fixed the issue which hides OALECD8 by default

The new *9th edition* of Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Chinese Dictionary is now available, with 1,000+ extra entries that are exclusively available in the app version but not the print dictionary, and over 6,000 new words, new meanings and revisions

-New “Default dictionary” setting – allows you to directly open the dictionary entry after you have chosen a word from the word list. Go to Settings to pick your Default dictionary.
-Shortcuts now enabled – these will allow you to select a word from other apps (e.g. Safari) and tap ‘Share’ to look up the dictionary directly, or you can use voice input to look up the dictionary. See how to use: Settings > Guide to using this app > Using Shortcuts. See our demo video: Catalogue > Visit our Facebook page.
-About searching phrases – type in the phrase, and add a space after it.
-Dictionary corrections
